in_scope: RG-01: Navigate to 'My Reading Goals' page from user dashboard
RG-02: Create/set annual reading goal (positive integer) and save
RG-03: Display saved goal number and current progress count
RG-04: Increment progress when a book is marked as 'read'
RG-05: Auto or refresh-based update of progress display after marking a book as read
RG-06: Edit or change the saved goal for the current year
out_of_scope: Testing on browsers other than latest Chrome and Firefox (e.g., Safari, Edge, IE)
Data migration or schema change testing

test_approach_summary.methodology: Manual scripted test case execution complemented by exploratory testing, using requirement-based test design and risk-based prioritization

assumptions: Stable QA environment (mirroring production) will be available from 2024-07-30.
Feature build is code-complete and delivered to QA by end of day 2024-07-29.
Existing 'mark as read' functionality is already stable and only needs integration verification.
risks: Delay in build delivery or environment setup could compress the execution window.
Critical integration defects with the existing 'mark as read' flow may require major rework and re-testing.
Unforeseen UI inconsistencies may generate additional defects, extending execution and fix cycles.
